title: Add viewport scroll percentage to output pane header
description:
Show scroll position in output pane header:

When content overflows viewport, show percentage:
'Agent Output (45%)'

Implementation:
if m.viewport.TotalLineCount() > m.viewport.VisibleLineCount() {
    scrollPct := int(m.viewport.ScrollPercent() * 100)
    header = fmt.Sprintf("Agent Output (%d%%)", scrollPct)
}

Update on:
- Initial content load
- Scroll navigation (j/k, ctrl+d/u, g/G)
- Window resize
- New output appended

Match ticks behavior exactly.
closed_reason: Feature already implemented in renderOutputPane() at lines 1008-1019. Shows scroll percentage in format 'Agent Output (XX%)' when viewport.TotalLineCount() > viewport.Height. Added 2 unit tests to validate: TestRenderOutputPane_ScrollPercentage (verifies % shown only when content overflows) and TestRenderOutputPane_ScrollPercentageUpdatesOnScroll (verifies % indicator present at different scroll positions). All tests pass.
